title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Revised
description:
Gather and document the project's scope, objectives, and functional and non-functional requirements, including user stories, technical specifications, and constraints. Ensure to consider the following aspects:

1. User Experience: Define the target audience, their needs, and desired user experience for the platform. Conduct user research and create personas to guide design decisions.
2. Historical and Future Scenarios: Identify the initial set of historical periods and future scenarios to be simulated, and the criteria for selecting and adding new ones. Establish a process for community input and voting on new content additions.
3. Educational and Entertainment Elements: Determine the balance between educational and entertainment aspects, and how they will be integrated. Consider gamification strategies to increase engagement and learning.
4. Simulation Fidelity: Establish the desired level of realism and accuracy for the simulations. Define a grading system for simulation quality based on research and historical accuracy.
5. Scalability and Performance: Consider the expected user load and define scalability and performance requirements. Identify potential bottlenecks and plan for future growth.
6. Security and Privacy: Identify potential security and privacy concerns, and define measures to address them. Implement encryption, secure authentication, and data protection practices.
7. Monetization and Business Model: Explore potential revenue streams such as subscription models, in-app purchases, advertising, and partnerships. Define a sustainable business model that aligns with user needs and market trends.
8. Compliance and Legal: Identify any relevant legal and regulatory requirements. Consult with legal experts to ensure compliance with data protection laws, intellectual property rights, and historical accuracy.
9. Documentation: Ensure that all development processes are well-documented for future reference and knowledge transfer.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, modules, and their interactions, as well as the technology stack and infrastructure requirements. The design should consider scalability, performance, security, data management, simulation engine, user interface, integration with external services (e.g., payment gateways, historical data sources), and adhere to the project's scope and requirements. Furthermore, ensure the system architecture is modular, extensible, and maintainable.

title: Design User Interface and Experience
description: Design the user interface and user experience for the time-travel tourism platform, including wireframes, mockups, and prototypes.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Implement the backend services and APIs required for the time-travel simulation, including data management, business logic, and integration with external services.

title: Develop Frontend Application
description: Implement the frontend application for the time-travel tourism platform, including the user interface, interactions, and integration with backend services.

title: Set up Database and Data Management
description: Design and implement the database schema and data management strategies for storing and retrieving simulation data, user profiles, and other relevant information.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect user data, prevent unauthorized access, and ensure the overall security of the platform.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated builds, testing, and deployment of the application to various environments.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute various testing activities, including unit testing, integration testing, performance testing, and user acceptance testing, to ensure the quality and reliability of the platform.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including technical documentation, user guides, and training materials, to support the deployment and usage of the platform.
